Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add automatic header-to-subheading conversion for Twitter Articles (v1.0.3)

- Formatter now collects header text (h1-h6) for post-paste processing
- Receiver detects paste events and automatically converts headers to subheadings
- Uses simulated mouse clicks to interact with Twitter''s formatting toolbar
- Updates CLAUDE.md to document Twitter Article posting issues and fixes

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add automatic blockquote newline fixing for Twitter Articles (v1.0.4)

- After headers are fixed, automatically fix missing newlines in blockquotes
- Parses original HTML content to find multi-paragraph blockquotes
- Positions cursor and simulates Enter key to restore line breaks
- Removed separate "Fix Twitter Newlines" button - now integrated into flow
- Added webNavigation permission and updated content script matching

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
